name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empler AI | AI Workflows with GPT & More

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Next-Generation AI Tool For Better Outcomes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Empler AI is a powerful AI extension designed to revolutionize the professional and business world, available in the Chrome Web Store. It is equipped with a user-friendly interface and various AI-powered features.

Empler AI helps you in your business in the best way with ready-made AI templates. There are currently LinkedIn-specific templates and templates for all sites. AI templates for other platforms will be added soon.

‚úÖ Ready to Use Templates Already Live

Ready-made templates for the whole Web: Rewriter, Summarizer, Simply explainer, Translator, Grammar Checker, Paragraph Merger, Text Shortener, and Sentence Expender.

Ready-made templates for LinkedIn: We offer many ready-made templates for production, reply, research, etc. in the areas of posts, articles, profiles, and messages.

üìù Helpful Notes:

- Make sure you are in the LinkedIn post-related workflows with the link to the post as you are not in the stream.
- When drafting a reply to all comments, do not forget to make all comments open by pressing the Load More button in the comments.
- DM only works when you are in a Message Box.
- In all Workflows, the option to add Brand Voice for more relevant AI outputs is optional.

üôå Key Features

- Artificial Intelligence Powered Content Generation: Create any text quickly and efficiently using GPT, Claude, and Mixtral AI models.
- Multi-Platform Compatibility: We offer ready-made templates for many platforms other than LinkedIn. Automate your workflows on these platforms too.
- User-Friendly Interface: Empler AI provides an easy and intuitive experience for users of all levels.

üõ†Ô∏è Create Workflow

Although not through Chrome, we make it possible to create workflows from https://empler.ai. The workflows you create are automatically added to the Recent field in our Chrome Plugin.

Fully Customizable Workflows:

- Form Fields: These are fields for you to enter information. You can create form fields for reference information, language, tone of voice, etc. You can pass this information to one or more elements in the workflow.
- Workflow elements: Models like GPT and Mixtral AI can also be added to workflows according to the needs of many web scrapers. You can change the prompts for models and Agents. We offer more than 50 ready-to-use prompts. The output from each element can be passed to another element via curly brackets. Thus, multiple AI tasks can be completed in an endless chain.
- You can share the workflows they create with others.
- Workflows can run instantly or time-based. It can be run regularly in the background at specified times every day.

üéØ Why Empler AI?

- Time Savings: Speed up your content creation, response, and engagement processes with Empler AI.
- Increased Productivity: Automating your workflows allows you to get more done in less time.
- Strengthening Engagement: Expand your network and strengthen your brand with quality content and engagement.

üõ°Ô∏è Privacy and Security

- We Care About Your Privacy: Protecting your data is a priority for us. Empler AI respects user privacy and will never share your data with third parties. It does not show advertisements to its users. Our privacy policy is available on our website (https://empler.ai/legal/privacy-policy)

- Disclaimer: Empler AI is not affiliated with LinkedIn, OpenAI, Claude AI Model (trademark of Anthropic), and Mixtral (trademark of Mistral AI). We do not accept any responsibility for the answers provided.

üí° Less AI Talk, More AI Work

With the motto "Less AI Talk, More AI Work", Empler AI is designed for AI assistants to create real value in your work life. With Empler AI, professionals and companies can use their time more efficiently, automate their business processes, and increase their interactions.

üöÄ Start Now

Empler AI is ready to transform your work life. Download it now from the Chrome Web Store and meet your AI-powered assistant. Empler AI gives you everything you need to start a new era in your business.

- Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
- Copy and paste the information into the form fields or type what you want in the Goal field after the ready-made information.
- Press the Generate button. It's that simple. You are starting to get AI responses to do the most effective work.

üåü Points and Support

If you like Empler and find it useful, you can help spread the word. Share Empler with your colleagues and network. You can help us reach more people on the Chrome Web Store by clicking ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê and leaving a reply.

Empler is designed and developed with love by Empler AI Inc. All rights reserved. for support, you can contact us at <support@empler.ai>.
